job description:
SAP QM Data Analyst
Ref No.: 18-38622

Location: Indianapolis, Indiana
Job Description and responsibilities:
Work with the Functional team to understand the data requirements and data structure for the data objects assigned to that work stream plus their inter-

dependency/integrity requirements within and across work streams
Ensure that the data deliverables correctly reflect the Functional design documents meaning responsibility for work stream conversion design documents and functional

mapping documents
Handle change requests on data design resulting from a change to/addition to Functional design
The data consultant will have responsibility for data migration across the functional work streams in area of: Quality Management:
Ensuring delivery of data analysis, data mapping and data validation
Facilitating ownership of the Data Delivery with the Business Data Owners
Facilitating ownership of Data Quality with the Functional Leads as a proxy for the Global Process Owners.
Providing regular progress updates to the Program and business stakeholders

Experience and Key Skills needed:
Understanding of various data elements & reports associated with SAP QM and its interdependencies with SAP PP and SAP MM modules
Experience in Configuration of SAP QM and Material Management based on business requirements
2+ full cycle implementations including: Scoping and Planning, Process Design, Configuration, Testing, Deployment, and Post Go-Live Support
Minimum of 5 years' experience in SAP QM
